Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the SH-SY5Y neuroblastoma cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression levels were significantly reduced in cells expressing the c.307A>G variant.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each condition.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate to ensure consistency.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PARK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Two-tailed Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression levels greater than 80% of the wild-type control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression levels less than 50% of the wild-type control.
